text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Average daily air temperature minimum: -2 ℃. 
Average hours of sunshine in the month: 40.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As the numbers suggest, December in Germany is 
dark and cold. But it is also a time of bright nights, 
lit by gentle 2700K lights. The reason for that is…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Christmas. A time cherished by the German people, 
and one where my parents are exceedingly busy 
running their cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I remember watching my father work long into the night, 
visibly exhausted, pouring his heart and soul into measuring 
sugar down to the gram ——

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: …It's a gram too much…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As a child, perhaps his overly serious attitude unsettled me… 
but I posed him a question that I now know to be off the mark.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: Papa, why are you so fussy about that? A small difference won't make your cakes less delicious!

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: …Flash. Remember well. A single gram can ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: —— throw everything off, he said.

One day at the track, a black-haired horsegirl 
stood out among the students training.
—— 1 minute, 58.1 seconds. Task completed.

Five minute break at 11:45, right on schedule. 
After that ——

She'd been running quietly for a while now, checking her times, 
taking breaks… It looked like she was smoothly completing 
a training program she had made.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, hey… That girl over there, isn't that Eishin Flash? 
She's an exchange student from Germany, wasn't she?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that's her. She's been here for like a year now, I think? 
I've never talked to her though…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, crap… did she hear us? 
L-Let's move, c'mon…

It was rare to see anybody from Germany, even at this academy 
with its many exchange students. Add in her clinical demeanor, 
and it's no surprise she'd pique the interests of other students.

But she seemed completely oblivious 
to the murmurs around her…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Time to continue.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Phew…!

Her neatly coiffed black hair and tail glistened in the sun. 
I found myself attracted to the beautiful way they floated 
through the wind as she ran.

Some time later, I noticed Eishin Flash somewhere else. 
She seemed to have gotten involved with a cheerful horsegirl…

Comee oon, Flaaashhh. Just for a little bit. Please? 
Just come look at my performance for a moment～♪

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …How many minutes are in a "moment"?
Huh?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon, please speak in precise terms. 
Please tell me how many minutes and seconds 
your concert is scheduled for.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Wehh!? Don't tease me like we're in grade school～!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…I am not. But I planned my schedule down to 
the second, so I don't have a lot of time to spare.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
There it is again! Your schedule! 
It's okay to shuffle it around a little～!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, I can't tolerate even a second of deviation. 
That is not how things should be done.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
This time, I defined my schedule in seconds 
and accounted for travel time. It is flawless, 
and focused on self-development…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As long as I adhere to it, I will see the expected 
results from the Selection Race this time.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I mean, sure the upcoming race is really important to you, but…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: It is not important so much as I am chasing the correct result.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: R-Right… You're not pushing yourself too hard, are you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
There is not a single issue. 
Everything is proceeding properly and without deviation.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…Excuse me, I have already lost 5 minutes 
and 55 seconds of travel time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Please inform me about your next performance 
ahead of time. I will include it in my schedule 
after the Selection Race. Goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ahh, hey!?

Eishin Flash ran off with a neutral expression. 
Apparently she is a very punctual girl.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Aah～ she's gone. Well then～ There's someone here who looks very excited to watch my performance☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Falco knew right away from the way you stared at her♪ 
Let me show you to☆ your☆ seat☆

As this pushy horsegirl dragged me with her, my mind 
was still on Eishin Flash… I decided I would go watch 
her Selection Race.
However, on the day of the Selection Race, Eishin Flash would…
